mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">本文作者是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> “</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

，<span lang="EN-US">1998</span>年写于水木清华<span lang="EN-US">BBS</span>。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
color:#363636;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#363636;mso-font-kerning:0pt">原文已经找不到了，本文是<span lang="EN-US">2002</span>年水木清华<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>区的转贴版。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">--------------------------------------------</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#363636;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#363636;mso-font-kerning:0pt">OO</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#363636;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，<span lang="EN-US">OO</span>以后，及其极限<span lang="EN-US">(1)</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#363636;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2002-4-1  </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">动网先锋</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">   <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif; color: rgb(38, 38, 38);">1</span><span style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(38, 38, 38);">、什么是软件开发</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif; color: rgb(38, 38, 38);">?  </span><br></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><u><b><i><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span style="background:fuchsia;mso-highlight:fuchsia">软件开发的过程就是人们使用各种计算机语言将人们关心的现实世界映射到计</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
background:fuchsia;mso-highlight:fuchsia;mso-font-kerning:0pt">   <o:p></o:p></span></i></b></u></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
background:fuchsia;mso-highlight:fuchsia;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><u><i><b>算机世界的过程</b>；</i></u></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　现在的计算机的数学理论基础是由计算机的开山鼻祖，大名鼎鼎的图灵于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1937</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">年提出的图灵机模型。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　在这本书中，维特跟斯坦阐述了自己的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">"</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">"</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-font-kerning:0pt">的代表人物之一。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;

"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">其他著名的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">。该书的出版开创了哲学研究的新方向。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　完成这本书后，维特跟斯坦认为自己已经解决了所有的哲学问题，于是他就真</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

mso-font-kerning:0pt">的放弃了哲学，先是作了一个花匠，后来作了一名小学教师。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">需要说明的是，他</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
